name: Top Trump secret backyard story
description:
When the great man is out doing important stuff like working,
cute animals from the near by forrest intrudes the pieceful backyard of the house and brings life to the wonderful neighbourhood.

Birds have been trapped in bubbles and Mr Squirrlie comes to the rescue in the shaddows of the white house.

Throw, bounce and match the colour jelly balls and gather powerups and awesome megaballs in order to unlock tons and tons of tricky and highly addictive levels along the way and save all the trapped cute birds!

Play the endless game or explore all of the worlds to unlock in the puzzle game backyard story!

Super fun game for any age to play,
no ads - no extra in ap ppurchases.
Just 100% pure fun and awesomeness!
